name: Senior GX Data Platform Engineer
description:
We invite you to the Gaming Experiences Data Platform team. We process data from millions of setups and make them useful for content targeting purposes. Our data sources include traditional PC systems, mobile devices, and distributed Web services. Our growth areas include user base segmentation, A/B experiments, personalized recommendations, and much more.

Are you ready to dive into data, implement the processing logic, provide the data access APIs, and deliver the targeted experience to NVIDIA users across the world? NVIDIA gaming services are growing rapidly, so join us now to build outstanding data pipelines and analysis tools!

Our technology stack relies on a combination of industry-standard open source components (Spark, ELK, Cassandra, Kafka, PostgreSQL, AWS toolset, etc.). We’re looking for a senior hardworking, forward-thinking, and ambitious engineer to extend the team.

What you will be doing:

  • Participate in analysis and development of aggregated user profiles

  • Manipulate with large datasets to load, search, transform and export the data using cluster-based technologies

  • Develop internally and externally facing APIs for data retrieval, processing, and transformation

  • Automate end-to-end integration and stress tests to ensure system stability and capacity

  • Improve data quality and analysis processes, identify intelligent approaches to detect and to root cause the outliers in data models

  • Work on a range of business- and customer-facing data analysis projects including user recommendations, user surveying, crash/exceptions analysis, A/B testing for different use-cases across PC/Mobile/Web platforms

  • Prepare documentation for the designs, processes, policies, data formats, and test cases within the scope of your projects.

What we need to see:

  • Implement readable, testable, scalable, and extensible code (primarily Java/Scala/Python), 5+ years of development experience

  • Be familiar with industry-accepted data storage and processing tools including Cassandra, HDFS/Hive, Spark, S3

  • Experience with the cloud platforms - AWS, Azure, or similar

  • Be proactive in proposing better system designs/architectures to build reliable data flow, combining analytical batch processing, real-time data flows, and low-latency APIs

  • Your strong sides include interpersonal, presentation, and reporting skills, especially in the context of a distributed international team

  • Upper-intermediate oral and written technical English

Ways to stand out of a crowd:

  • Basic Web UI development skills (Angular, React)

  • Admiration for PC/mobile gaming will help you in working with our data sets

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, perform essential job functions, and receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation.
